channel.title: Remote Assistance – Underdog Solutions
channel.description: Bespoke IT and AV solutions for companies and private individuals.

item.title: IT/ Audio Visual Advice – I.e. What to buy
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: Hop on a Zoom/ Brave call with me, where I’ll spend an hour with you to help you achieve your goals.   Thinking of buying: or upgrading a new laptop/ PC? a new Hi-Fi/ speakers? a home cinema upgrade?   Lets have a chat and see what options are available to you.
item.content:encoded:
Hop on a Zoom/ Brave call with me, where I’ll spend an hour with you to help you achieve your goals.

 

Thinking of buying:

or upgrading a new laptop/ PC?

a new Hi-Fi/ speakers?

a home cinema upgrade?

 

Lets have a chat and see what options are available to you.

item.title: Remote assistance (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.content:encoded: This is for remote assistance via one of our remote software(s) to fix software related issues on your PC.  Multiple hours can be purchased.
